titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the B.H. Gerwin papers, 1910-1970

publicationstmt.publisher: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Miranda Webster March 2014

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Wyoming. American Heritage Center.

did.abstract: B.H. Gerwin was a copper economics consultant. This collection contains his professional papers.

bioghist.head: Biography of
bioghist.p: B.H. Gerwin was a copper economics consultant. He served as the assistant to the director of the Arizona State Department of Mineral Resources and manager of the Kennecott Copper Corporationâ€™s smelting and refining contracts and scheduling for 34 years.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection contains correspondence; newspaper and magazine articles by or concerning B.H. Gerwin, copper mining and air pollution; mining publications and reports; industry statistics; subject files concerning copper, the Kennecot Mines, refinery studies, duty and anti-trust; annual reports of Chino Copper Company, Kennecott Copper Corporation, Nevada Consolidated Copper Company, Ray Consolidated Copper Company and Utah Copper Company; and scrapbooks concerning mining companies and mining history.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on the materials for research purposes, and the collection is open to the public.

userestrict.head: Copyright Information
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for observing all copyright, property, and libel laws as they apply.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: There are no known other archival collections created by B.H. Gerwin at the date of processing.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This material was received from B.H. Gerwin in June 1971, October 1975 and July 1984.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Item Description, Box Number, Folder Number, Collection Name, Collection Number, American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming.
